description:
The story centers on a typical high school boy and a super-deformed, doll-like robot that suddenly appears in his bedroom. The robot declares itself to be the boy's wife, and only then does a beautiful girl emerge out of the robot's mouth. The girl turns out to be someone who was promised the boy's hand in marriage ten years earlier.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

__Height:__ 159 cm
__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/rie_k_0530) | [Profile (I'm Enterprise)](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=52) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/kugimiyarie-blog/) | [Lantis Music](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/kugimiyarie/)

**Non-Anime Roles:**
- Irene - Arknights (VG)
- Unknown God - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Kiana Kaslana - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Luna - Punishing: Gray Raven (VG)
- Vesti - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- iDoll Ocean - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Haruka Sawamura - Yakuza Series (VG)
- Vena - TEVI (VG)
- Fukayama Ayane - Nogizaka Haruka no Himitsu: Cosplay, Hajimemashita (VN)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Shenhe - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Sugar - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Dikke - Reverse: 1999 (VG)

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

A close personal friend of [Kozue Amano](https://anilist.co/staff/96937/Kozue-Amano). She was invited on stage to Anime Festival Asia 2011.

In 2013, she married a man from outside the anime industry.

__Non anime roles:__
- Azami - Xenoblade Chronicles 2 (VG)
- Dorothy - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- [Jean](https://anilist.co/character/190865/Jean-Gunnhildr) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- [Kotori Kanbe](https://anilist.co/character/37486/) - Rewrite (VG)
- Mayer - Arknights (VG)
- [Wakamo Kosaka](https://anilist.co/character/287031/) - Blue Archive (VG)
- Changli - Wuthering Waves (VG)
- Castorice - Honkai Star Rail (VG)
- Metis - Persona 3 Reload : Episode Aigis -The Answer (VG)

__Height:__ 165 cm

[Website](https://www.tomatsuharuka.com/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/tomatsuharuka-blog)

Tomatsu debuted in 2007, starring in Shinkyoku Soukai Polyphonica as Corticarte Apa Lagranges. Since then, she has had other major roles such as Lala Satalin Deviluke in To Love-Ru and Shiho Sannomiya in Zettai Karen Children. Before graduating from high school in 2008, she used to live in Ichimomiya city where she often took the shinkansen, traveling back and forth between Nagoya and Tokyo to attend recordings. On January 11, 2019, she married a man from outside the entertainment industry.

One of the members of the voice actress unit [Sphere](https://anilist.co/staff/103636).

__Non-anime roles:__
- Mary - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岩浪美和) | [Twitter](https://x.com/i/user/169097071)

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yamacane0901/) | [Blog (jp)](https://ameblo.jp/kanku0901/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcZ_aVrm0ux7Jw2G5jgq6Gw/)

Yutaka Yamamoto is a director, scriprtwriter, lyricist and storyboarder. Infamous for his incendiary behavior on Twitter and for having been fired from [Kyoto Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/2/) and [Ordet](https://anilist.co/studio/334/), the latter of which he helped co-found. 

As a member of Kyoto Animation, he rose to prominence within the company after serving as assistant director on [Munto 2: Beyond the Walls of Time](https://anilist.co/anime/1135/). In 2006, he was selected to be the chief episode director of [The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya](https://anilist.co/anime/849/), after which he became well known among anime fans for the ending dance theme he choreographed. He was to make his full directorial debut with [Lucky Star](https://anilist.co/anime/1887/), but was replaced after four episodes due to "performance issues." In a later radio interview, Yamamoto confirmed he was fired by Kyoto Animation and unsuccessfully attempted to win back his job. 

Yamamoto has threatened to quit his career in anime production six times over the years. In May 2019, Yamamoto vowed never to "work on anything related to animation again" after finishing [Hakubo](https://anilist.co/anime/98784/). He has become notorious for his incendiary behavior on Twitter, including calling fans of anime "mentally disabled," discriminatory remarks about Chinese and Korean anime fans, and attacking his former cast members, which resulted in him being temporarily suspended from Twitter in 2018.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yamacane0901/) | [Blog (jp)](https://ameblo.jp/kanku0901/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcZ_aVrm0ux7Jw2G5jgq6Gw/)

Kouhei Kawase is a Japanese producer, composer and radio personality.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/chinbotsuyamatn)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/chinbotsuyamatn)
**Satoshi Oosedo** is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.
**Satoshi Oosedo** is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tomos12)

He started working at Studio Deen, where he made his debut as animator in an episode of Dai Guard. After leaving Deen he became freelance and works mainly on productions for J.C.Staff but also on some titles for Bones, Gonzo and Feel. He is particularly renowned as bishoujo animator, since he tends to pay attention to detailed character appearance and traits for girls, as well as providing his characters cute and bashful gestures.

title.native: 住めば都のコスモス荘 すっとこ大戦ドッコイダー
